Content.Text: Hey! Wake up! Wake up NOW!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE> is no longer with us. It seems 
she passed away from old age.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You never showed enough affection!
You're a failure as a stock breeder!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
You took really great care of her. I
wish she had lived a little longer.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
She passed away with a smile on her
face. She was lucky to have you care
for her.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I just can't leave her like this. I'll
take her to the graveyard outside of
the town.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll bury her myself. So long!

Met on <MOJI1> <MOJI2>, Year <MOJI0>. 
Total victories in yearly events: <MOJI3>
